author: jleroux
msg: Fix possible NPEs in Content Component reported by Dimitri Valax on dev ML, close https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-4198 - OFBIZ-4198

author: lektran
msg: Add inline-jdbc attribute idle-maxsize for greater control over the max idle connections that should remain in the pool.  Previously it was always set to half of pool-maxsize (and still defaults to this value)

author: dblevins
msg: Clearly mark standalone web modules as such and ensure their jars are listed in the "fake" appmodule libraries list

author: bdube
msg: Adjust resume to document transformation stylesheet to correct FO generation
